availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James B. Bennett (Hartford, Ohio County, Kentucky)

body.p: Hartford, Ohio County, Kentucky, cabinet maker. Kentucky native. Married to Ann Bennett. Father of Luella Bennett, Virginia Bennett, James Bennett. Cabinet maker in Hartford, Ohio County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ohio County, Hartford, p. 202.
Find A Grave, "James B. Bennett (November 6, 1823- December 21, 1867)," Memorial #125041291, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/125041291 (accessed January 4, 2019).
